body.p:
The RPP V2 can be operated within the following environmental conditions:
Standard ambient operating temperature: 25°C (77°F).
Ambient operating temperature range: 0⁰C to 40⁰C (32⁰F to 104⁰F)
Relative humidity range: 0% to 95% non-condensing.
Maximum altitude 3,300 ft. For operation above 3,300 ft., please contact the factory before ordering.
Maximum noise generation of the RPP V2 is 42 dBA.
